
Two careless agents generated their RSA keys with a shared prime. Your task: decrypt the intercepted message, 4000523984399794075380837374466342473331149823015909253171480033318231876376484678141095861300407442399131658637421884252933215936679474161609489758471983, by exploiting their mistake.


The flag format is flag{...}
n=4713021036489071223531252516100531202846716690402308162246033757718199166987803745379770994206165125477466825686629051937510322526230562956048214922358793, n2=5106609352145241867334933362595712349879360850952316450735581497356730970259931699451217962913616155056110619687078663715320738615015775545851376156970859, e=1877634239205891602359120090235436383635215031276225789085329230080297702901345867775843800639626585287575529926370431029856560060249703262666652732363189

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{m3gut71z}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 4000523984399794075380837374466342473331149823015909253171480033318231876376484678141095861300407442399131658637421884252933215936679474161609489758471983
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=4713021036489071223531252516100531202846716690402308162246033757718199166987803745379770994206165125477466825686629051937510322526230562956048214922358793, n2=5106609352145241867334933362595712349879360850952316450735581497356730970259931699451217962913616155056110619687078663715320738615015775545851376156970859, e=1877634239205891602359120090235436383635215031276225789085329230080297702901345867775843800639626585287575529926370431029856560060249703262666652732363189
extra_info: p=70247331568740540476714309517824062073962614103757186849264747149856708562143, q=67091815891641998352287180839091509121192649657283494417515988308170722326551, q2=72694709366264941404930311498231857063786157477250923429041234559814284641013, φ(n)=4713021036489071223531252516100531202846716690402308162246033757718199166987666406232310611667336123987109910115433896673749281844963782220590187491470100, φ(n2)=5106609352145241867334933362595712349879360850952316450735581497356730970259788757410282957431734510435094563767940914943739730504737469564141705163767704

archetype: rsa
